verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:14
verses.text: And he made the vail of blue, and purple, and crimson, and fine linen, and wrought cherubims thereon.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:15
verses.text: Also he made before the house two pillars of thirty and five cubits high, and the chapiter that was on the top of each of them was five cubits.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:16
verses.text: And he made chains, as in the oracle, and put them on the heads of the pillars; and made an hundred pomegranates, and put them on the chains.
